channel.title: [508] how to make a 508 sever with hamachi
channel.description:
Ok hi and welcome to my first {tut} on how to make a 508 sever and client with hamachi. this is simple for beginner.
(1)you will need a source and client and a 508 cache and hamachi. (2)i will give u links to them (just the ones that i know work and are essay to setup)
(3) links... Mithscape source (this is not owned by me full credit goes to the creators off mithscape
[url=http://uppit.com/v/LMCN4XW5]http://uppit.com/v/LMCN4XW5[/url]
508 client + 508 cache [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?yynhtdmt3d3]http://www.mediafire.com/?yynhtdmt3d3[/url]
hamachi [url=https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi/list.asp]https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi/list.asp[/url]
********************************************************************************** now once u have all those things above we get into the fun part =].
(1)Installing hamachi.
first off download hamachi then run the install untill u get up to a box like this..
[img]http://file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/My%20Documents/My%20Pictures/Hamachi.JPG[/img]
once its like the pic above ^^^ press the power on button then on the triangle click it then click create a new network type in what you would like your rsps to be called (runescape privet sever) and make the pass simple for when people wont to join example network name:darthscape :pass 123 ^^don't use capitals IN YOUR HAMACHI NET WORK ITS CASE SENSATIVE now u should have your network setup ..
(2)how to setup source is simple 1/10 just look for a file that says cmd in there there will be a hole lot off setup dos.batch files on the one that sayss build [also means compile] rite click it and click edit now look for a line off code that says [code]@echo off cd ../src echo Compiling palidino76.rs2 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.update "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/update/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.items "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/items/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.misc "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/misc/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.combat "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/combat/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.io "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.io.packets "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.net "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.util "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.world.mapdata "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.world.items "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java pause [/code]
(3)all the lines that have \jdk1.6.0_14. or what eva number is there in this case mine is 14 the number that was there 10 i think change that number to your jdk virshion if u don't have a jdk vershion heres a link [url=http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp]http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp[/url]
and do the same with the dos batch file that says Initialize/ witch is your run.bat file now run the Initialize file
DO NOT CLOSE IT!!
(4)now 508 cache save essy bit for last not evan 2 seconds work .. open up the client in there will be a folder called cache508 open up my computer open up local disc c:\ now click on the folder cache 508 and drag it into local disc c:\ thats it.
(5)Now remember hamachi this is were its needed your hamachi ip is at the top off your hamachi box should be like 5.123.123.123 thats not a real one just an example now you Initialize should be running witch is your sever if u have closed it reopen it do not close it now go to you
508 ip changer and the ip on your hamachi and put it in the box thats ascking for your ip when u have run your client enter the ip click enter and if u have followed my instuckshions properly it will load up.
[b]HOOPED THIS WORKED FOR YOU IF IT DID'NT JUST GIVE UP U HAVE NO HOPE IF YOU CANT GET IT RUNNING CODEING IS SO MUCH HARDER[/b]
AND SORRY FOR NO PICS EVRYTIME I PUT ONE ON IT DOSENT WORK WELL HAVE FUN COMMENT OF THIS WAS HELPFULL.
PROWED OWNER OFF 317 AND 508 PIEMAN22 DARTHSCAPE317 DARTHSCAPE 508

item.title: [508] how to make a 508 sever with hamachi
item.dc:creator: @pieman22 pieman22
item.description:
@pieman22 wrote:

Ok hi and welcome to my first {tut} on how to make a 508 sever and client with hamachi. this is simple for beginner.

(1)you will need a source and client and a 508 cache and hamachi.
(2)i will give u links to them (just the ones that i know work and are essay to setup)

(3) links… Mithscape source (this is not owned by me full credit goes to the creators off mithscape

http://uppit.com/v/LMCN4XW5

508 client + 508 cache http://www.mediafire.com/?yynhtdmt3d3

hamachi https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi/list.asp

now once u have all those things above we get into the fun part =].

(1)Installing hamachi.

first off download hamachi then run the install untill u get up to a box like this…

once its like the pic above ^^^ press the power on button then on the triangle click it then click create a new network type in what you would like your rsps to be called (runescape privet sever) and make the pass simple for when people wont to join example network name:darthscape :pass 123
^^don’t use capitals IN YOUR HAMACHI NET WORK ITS CASE SENSATIVE
now u should have your network setup …

(2)how to setup source is simple 1/10 just look for a file that says cmd in there there will be a hole lot off
setup dos.batch files on the one that sayss build [also means compile] rite click it and click edit now look for a line off code that
says @echo off cd ../src echo Compiling palidino76.rs2 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.update "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/update/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.items "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/items/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.misc "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/misc/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.player.combat "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/player/combat/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.io "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.io.packets "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.net "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.util "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.world.mapdata "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java echo Compiling palidino76.rs2.world.items "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java pause

(3)all the lines that have \jdk1.6.0_14. or what eva number is there in this case mine is 14 the number that was there 10 i think change that number to your jdk virshion if u don’t have a jdk vershion heres a link
http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp

and do the same with the dos batch file that says Initialize/ witch is your run.bat file now run the Initialize file

DO NOT CLOSE IT!!

(4)now 508 cache save essy bit for last not evan 2 seconds work … open up the client in there will be a folder called cache508 open up my computer open up local disc c:\ now click on the folder cache 508 and drag it into local disc c:\ thats it.

(5)Now remember hamachi this is were its needed your hamachi ip is at the top off your hamachi box
should be like 5.123.123.123 thats not a real one just an example now you
Initialize should be running witch is your sever if u have closed it reopen it do not close it now go to you

508 ip changer and the ip on your hamachi and put it in the box thats ascking for your ip when u have run your client enter the ip click enter and if u have followed my instuckshions properly it will load up.

HOOPED THIS WORKED FOR YOU IF IT DID’NT JUST GIVE UP U HAVE NO HOPE IF YOU CANT GET IT RUNNING CODEING IS SO MUCH HARDER

AND SORRY FOR NO PICS EVRYTIME I PUT ONE ON IT DOSENT WORK WELL HAVE FUN COMMENT OF THIS WAS HELPFULL.

PROWED OWNER OFF 317 AND 508 PIEMAN22 DARTHSCAPE317 DARTHSCAPE 508
